short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get a notification when you get new Private Messages on Newgrounds

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Have your new Private Messages from Newgrounds with you all the time, and as close as one click. Through the options, you can personalize your experience with this extension!
